text:
Getting started with some MILP, haven't really been in this domain to date.
Suggestions? <https://jump.dev/|JuMP> seems like the obvious place to go, but any caveats, hidden gems out there?

<@U9VG1AYSG> I think I recently saw you mention something about doing some really successful Julia MILP.

elements.text:
Getting started with some MILP, haven't really been in this domain to date.
Suggestions?
seems like the obvious place to go, but any caveats, hidden gems out there?
I think I recently saw you mention something about doing some really successful Julia MILP.

text: I recommend JuMP, with the Cbc solver.

elements.text: I recommend JuMP, with the Cbc solver.

text: If you are eligible for an academic licence, use Gurobi or CPLEX. Both are fast and robust.

elements.text: If you are eligible for an academic licence, use Gurobi or CPLEX. Both are fast and robust.

text: Yes, one of the main parts of my job is running "very large" (10's of millions of non-zeros in the canonical simplex matrix after pre-solving) MILP's "in production".  I've been using JuMP for this for years; it's really fantastic.  With MutableArithmetics, even very large problems are trivial to formulate

elements.text: Yes, one of the main parts of my job is running "very large" (10's of millions of non-zeros in the canonical simplex matrix after pre-solving) MILP's "in production".  I've been using JuMP for this for years; it's really fantastic.  With MutableArithmetics, even very large problems are trivial to formulate

text: Though, for my job we use Gurobi, which is a commercial solver.  Depressingly, there aren't any really good open source solvers.  I'd start with Cbc, but don't be afraid to try other things ,because different solvers might be good at different problems

elements.text: Though, for my job we use Gurobi, which is a commercial solver.  Depressingly, there aren't any really good open source solvers.  I'd start with Cbc, but don't be afraid to try other things ,because different solvers might be good at different problems
